member.name: MIB_IFROW
member.summary: TheMIB_IFROW structure stores information about a particular interface.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.wszName
member.summary: A pointer to a Unicode string that contains the name of the interface.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwIndex
member.summary: The index that identifies the interface. This index value may change when a network adapter is disabled and then enabled, and should not be considered persistent.

summary.para: The interface type as defined by the Internet Assigned Names Authority (IANA). For more information, see http://www.iana.org/assignments/ianaiftype-mib. Possible values for the interface type are listed in the Ipifcons.h header file.
The table below lists common values for the interface type although many other values are possible.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
Some other type of network interface.
An Ethernet network interface.
A token ring network interface.
A Fiber Distributed Data Interface (FDDI) network interface.
A PPP network interface.
A software loopback network interface.
An ATM network interface.
An IEEE 802.11 wireless network interface.
A tunnel type encapsulation network interface.
An IEEE 1394 (Firewire) high performance serial bus network interface.

A mobile broadband interface for WiMax devices.
Note This interface type is supported on Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, and later.

A mobile broadband interface for GSM-based devices.
Note This interface type is supported on Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, and later.

An mobile broadband interface for CDMA-based devices.
Note This interface type is supported on Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 R2, and later.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwMtu
member.summary: The Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) size in bytes.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwSpeed
member.summary: The speed of the interface in bits per second.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwPhysAddrLen
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the physical address specified by the bPhysAddr member.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.bPhysAddr
member.summary: The physical address of the adapter for this interface.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwAdminStatus
member.summary: The interface is administratively enabled or disabled.

summary.para: The operational status of the interface. This member can be one of the following values defined in the INTERNAL_IF_OPER_STATUS enumeration defined in the Ipifcons.h header file.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
LAN adapter has been disabled, for example because of an address conflict.
WAN adapter that is not connected.
For LAN adapters: network cable disconnected. For WAN adapters: no carrier.
WAN adapter that is in the process of connecting.
WAN adapter that is connected to a remote peer.
Default status for LAN adapters

summary.para: The length of time, in hundredths of seconds (10^-2 sec), starting from the last computer restart, when the interface entered its current operational state. This value rolls over after 2^32 hundredths of a second.

The dwLastChange member is not currently supported by NDIS. On Windows Vista and later, NDIS returns zero for this member. On earlier versions of Windows, an arbitrary value is returned in this member for the interfaces supported by NDIS. For interfaces supported by other interface providers, they might return an appropriate value.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwInOctets
member.summary: The number of octets of data received through this interface.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwInUcastPkts
member.summary: The number of unicast packets received through this interface.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwInNUcastPkts
member.summary: The number of non-unicast packets received through this interface. Broadcast and multicast packets are included.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwInDiscards
member.summary: The number of incoming packets that were discarded even though they did not have errors.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwInErrors
member.summary: The number of incoming packets that were discarded because of errors.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwInUnknownProtos
member.summary: The number of incoming packets that were discarded because the protocol was unknown.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwOutOctets
member.summary: The number of octets of data sent through this interface.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwOutUcastPkts
member.summary: The number of unicast packets sent through this interface.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwOutNUcastPkts
member.summary: The number of non-unicast packets sent through this interface. Broadcast and multicast packets are included.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwOutDiscards
member.summary: The number of outgoing packets that were discarded even though they did not have errors.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwOutErrors
member.summary: The number of outgoing packets that were discarded because of errors.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwOutQLen
member.summary: The transmit queue length. This field is not currently used.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.dwDescrLen
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the bDescr member.

member.name: MIB_IFROW.bDescr
member.summary: A description of the interface.
